{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Compaq_WL100 |wikipedia = |brand = Compaq |model = WL100 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = June 22, 2009 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Compaq_WL100 |sernum = |wlclass = B11 |series = |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 0138 |device_id = 0002 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = E2XSWL-2000N, OSZ3163B1 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:50:8B |chip1 = Harris;HFA3841; |chip2 = Intersil;HFA3861; |chip3 = Intersil;HFA3683A; |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Samsung |manuf_model = SWL-2000N |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/09/1999 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Korea |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :;OEM - [[Samsung SWL-2000N]] {{WiFiCert|W000589|04/10/2002}} {{See also|Intersil HWB3163}} *[http://djbnetbsd.drivehq.com/PC/NetBSD/PRISM/models.html On djb's PRISM models page] ([http://deviwiki.com/files/archive/djnetbsd_old/PRISM%20Models.html archived here])
*[http://djbnetbsd.drivehq.com/PC/NetBSD/PRISM/prism-wlan.html#Tested On djb's Tested cards page] ([http://deviwiki.com/files/archive/djnetbsd_old/Conexant%20(formerly%20Harris%20Intersil)%20PRISM%20II%202.5%203.html#Tested archived here]) 
Compaq WL100/PRISM II - FCC ID: E2XSWL-2000N (ODM/OEM == Samsung SWL-2000N) 
3.3 volt only card - won't fit in Multia or early Thinkpad 365XD or 560. 
Works fine in the Z50. Also works OK under Windows XP. 
Similar to Proxim Harmony OEM below.
wi0 at pcmcia0 function 0: Compaq WL100_11Mbps_Wireless_PC_Card, Version 01.00

wi0: using RF:PRISM2 MAC:HFA3841 CARD:HWB3163 rev.A
wi0: Intersil Firmware: Primary (0.3.0), Station (1.7.1)
wi0: 11b rates: 1Mbps 2Mbps 5.5Mbps 11Mbps
